name: Animals for Toddlers
description:
Added a whole new scene: AUSTRALIA!

The game now features SIX sceneries full of animals and surprises: farm, snowscape, desert-oasis, jungle, ocean and australia!

I finally added a "back" button! Grab the button and drag it to the blinking target area to go back to the menu!

"Animals for Toddlers" (formerly known as "FARM for Toddlers") is a beautiful app for small children.

Tap the different animals to interact with them and hear their common sound. Some animals and other funny stuff is hidden within the game. Can you find all secrets?

The first location (farm) is for free. Get all the rest of them via in-app purchase!

ATTENTION
If you don't want your child to "accidentally" buy the full version, be sure to disable in-app purchases via the settings menu of your device!
